purpose: The email announces the 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes (MPLR'25), inviting submissions of research papers, work-in-progress papers, and industry/tool papers. It outlines the topics of interest, submission categories, author instructions, and important dates for the conference. The email also provides details on the submission format and the review process.
evidence_sentences: The 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes (MPLR, formerly ManLang, originally PPPJ) is a premier forum for presenting and discussing novel results in all aspects of managed programming languages and runtime systems.
MPLR accepts three types of submissions: Regular research papers, Work-in-progress research papers, Industry and tool papers.
Submissions need to use the ACM SIGPLAN format with the `sigplan` style.
